AT1201.name: Student Attendance Report
AT1201.query: SELECT s.name, s.roll_no, sa.status FROM student_attendance sa JOIN students s ON s.id = sa.student_id WHERE sa.date = '{date}';

BAL01.name: Teacher Balance Report
BAL01.query: SELECT teacher_id, balance FROM teacher_leave_balance WHERE balance BETWEEN {min_balance} AND {max_balance};
